headline: FDA APPROVES UPLIZNA速 FOR ADULTS WITH GENERALIZED MYASTHENIA GRAVIS
summary: Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved UPLIZNA速 (inebilizumab-cdon) for the treatment of generalized myasthenia gravis (gMG) in adults who are anti-acetylcholine receptor (AChR) and anti-muscle specific tyrosine kinase (MuSK) antibody positive. The approval offers patients a new targeted treatment option that has the potential for long-term disease control with just two doses a year, after two initial loading doses.

headline: Danish weight loss drug maker outlines ambitious 2030 strategy, ramping up pressure on Novo, Lilly
summary: Growing competition from smaller players is tightening the race for market leaders Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly as more weight loss medicines near market entry.
